text: Danika 'Nika' McGuigan (4 January 1986 – 23 July 2019) was an Irish actress. She was known for her starring role as art student Danielle Mullane in Can't Cope, Won't Cope (2016–2018). == Biography == McGuigan was born in 1986 to Barry McGuigan, a former world champion boxer and his wife Sandra McGuigan. She appeared in several films and TV shows, including The Secret Scripture (2016) alongside Rooney Mara and Jack Reynor. Her last film was Cathy Brady's Wildfire. McGuigan was first diagnosed with acute lymphoblastic leukemia at age 11 in 1997, but recovered from the illness after two years of treatment. However, she died on 23 July 2019, from a cancer-related illness. == Filmography == ===Film=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year ! Title ! Role !
